name: BlueVine
description: Need fast funding for your business? BlueVine offers flexible business line of credit, invoice factoring, and term loan options tailored to your needs.

partnerships.name: The Bancorp
partnerships.title: BlueVine Adds Checking Accounts, Cards For SMBs | PYMNTS.com
partnerships.desription: BlueVine expands its financial services with small business (SMB) banking, connecting SMBs to a checking account and debit card to manage finances and payments.

partnerships.name: GovQuote
partnerships.title: GovQuote partners with BlueVine to offer working capital financing to government vendors
partnerships.desription: Bluevine and GovQuote partner to provide working capital financing to SMBs that provide goods and services to state, local, and education (SLED) government agencies.

partnerships.name: Nationwide
partnerships.title: Nationwide partners with BlueVine to help business owners get online growth financing
partnerships.desription: Nationwide expanding its relationship by offering BlueVine's fast and flexible financing to small businesses through Nationwide's Business Solutions Center.

partnerships.name: Ocrolus
partnerships.title: BlueVine Partners With Ocrolus for Faster Processing of Financing Applications
partnerships.desription: Ocrolus is a scalable fintech infrastructure platform that analyzes financial documents with speed and precision. BlueVine leverages Ocrolus technology to accelerate growth and scale operations efficiently
